类的使用
com.rd.xpkuisdk.manager.UIConfiguration.Builder

  • 使用UIConfiguration.Builder的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    com.rd.xpkuisdk.manager  

    • com.rd.xpkuisdk.manager中UIConfiguration.Builder的使用

      返回UIConfiguration.Builder的com.rd.xpkuisdk.manager中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.enableAlbumCamera(boolean enable)
      设置相册界面是否显示跳转拍摄按钮(仅相册api生效)
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.enableAutoRepeat(boolean enable)
      启用自动重播
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.enableMV(boolean enable)
      已过时。 
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.enableMV(boolean enable, java.lang.String url)
      配置mv 默认关闭
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.enableSpecialeffectsOuter(boolean enable)
      启用特效在mv的外面(不受MV影响)
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.enableTitlingOuter(boolean enable)
      启用字幕在mv的外面(不受MV影响)
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.enableWizard(boolean enable)
      设置向导化
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.hideMusic(boolean hide)
      已过时。 
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.hidePartEdit(boolean hide)
      已过时。 
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.hideProportion(boolean hidePorprotion)
      已过时。 
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.hideSort(boolean hideSort)
      已过时。 
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.openEditbyPicture(boolean hide)
      设置是否从相册打开编辑界面
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setAlbumSupportFormat(int format)
      设置相册支持格式
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setClipEditingModuleVisibility(UIConfiguration.ClipEditingModules module, boolean visibility)
      设置片断编辑功能模块显示与隐藏
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setCloudMusicUrl(java.lang.String cloudMusicUrl)
      云音乐,开启配乐2 有效
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setEditAndExportModuleVisibility(UIConfiguration.EditAndExportModules module, boolean visibility)
      设置编辑导出功能模块显示与隐藏
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setFilterType(int type)
      设置滤镜界面风格
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setMediaCountLimit(int count)
      限制相册选择媒体最大数量
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setMusicUrl(java.lang.String musicUrl)
      设置启用配乐方式二 (setSoundTrackType( UIConfiguration#SOUND_TRACK_LAYOUT_2))时的网络音乐链接
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setMVUrl(java.lang.String url)
      已过时。 
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setOrientation(int orientation)
      设置界面横竖屏方向
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setSoundTrackType(int type)
      设置配乐界面风格
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setVideoProportion(int proportion)
      设置视频比例
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.setVoiceLayoutType(int voiceType)
      配置配音模式
      UIConfiguration.Builder UIConfiguration.Builder.useCustomAlbum(boolean useCustomAlbum)
      设置是否使用自定义相册
